rule.rule_description: Reuse-first attestation requirement in code review

justification.reason: This PR was initiated during the grace period (2025-11-12 to 2025-12-10) when reuse-first attestation operates in WARN/MAJOR mode rather than BLOCKER mode.
justification.business_impact: Blocking this PR would delay critical feature delivery during the approved transition period.
justification.technical_constraints: Team is actively preparing reuse evidence artifacts but requires additional time to complete the full attestation process.
alternatives_considered: Delay PR until full attestation ready - rejected due to transition grace period allowance
Provide partial evidence - accepted as interim measure with remediation plan

compensating_controls.description: Remediation ticket created to complete full reuse attestation before grace period ends

measures.control: GitHub issue created tracking reuse attestation completion
measures.effectiveness: Ensures work is tracked and completed before enforcement date
measures.verification: Issue linked in PR, assigned to team lead, due before 2025-12-11

measures.control: Evidence preparation documented in task folder
measures.effectiveness: Partial evidence available for review, demonstrates good faith effort

remediation.plan: Complete full reuse attestation before grace period ends on 2025-12-10
remediation.completion_criteria: Full reuse attestation present in analysis/reuse-evaluation.md with all required sections completed

conditions: Remediation plan must be completed before 2025-12-11

audit_trail.details: Grace period waiver created for reuse-first attestation
Approved under grace period policy with remediation plan
